description: Enhanced charts and visualisation for net worth tracking, including interactive charts, asset allocation pie chart, and super fund growth breakdown.

userStories.title: Add time range selector to net worth chart
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to view my net worth history over different time ranges.
acceptanceCriteria: Add time range selector buttons: 3M, 6M, 1Y, All
Chart data updates when range changes
userStories.notes: Added TimeRangeSelector component with URL param persistence using Next.js useSearchParams/useRouter

userStories.title: Add mini sparkline to net worth hero card
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see a small trend indicator next to my net worth.
acceptanceCriteria: Add small sparkline (last 6 months) inside hero card
Green line if net worth increased, red if decreased
userStories.notes: Added Sparkline component using Recharts LineChart. Shows last 6 months of history, green if overall increase, red if decrease. Integrated into NetWorthHero component next to the net worth value.

userStories.title: Create asset allocation pie chart component
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see my asset allocation as a pie chart.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows asset types: Stocks, ETFs, Crypto, Super, Cash
Each slice colored by asset type
userStories.notes: Added AssetAllocationPieChart component using Recharts PieChart. Donut style with inner radius for cleaner look. Custom tooltip shows percentage, value, and holding count. Custom legend with compact values.

userStories.title: Add chart type toggle to asset allocation
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to switch between bar and pie chart views.
acceptanceCriteria: Default view is bars (existing progress bars)
userStories.notes: Added ViewToggle component to AssetAllocation with Bars/Pie options. Uses localStorage (asset-allocation-view key) for persistence. Integrated pie chart view using Recharts PieChart with custom tooltip and legend. Default is bars view.

userStories.title: Create super growth breakdown API endpoint
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API that returns super fund growth breakdown data.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns: employer_contrib, employee_contrib, investment_returns per month
Accepts holdingId or returns aggregated data for all super

userStories.title: Create super growth breakdown chart component
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see how my super fund balance has grown.
acceptanceCriteria: Stacked area chart: employer contrib, employee contrib, investment returns

userStories.title: Add super breakdown section to dashboard
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see my super breakdown on the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Add SuperGrowthChart to dashboard below asset allocation
Shows only if user has super holdings
Empty state if no super data available

userStories.title: Add monthly change indicators to summary cards
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see month-over-month changes.
acceptanceCriteria: Add MoM change badge to Total Assets card
Add MoM change badge to Total Debt card

userStories.title: Add assets vs debt comparison chart
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see how my assets compare to debt over time.
acceptanceCriteria: Create stacked area chart showing assets and debt
Assets shown in green, debt in red
Net worth line overlaid in white

userStories.title: Add chart view toggle to net worth section
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to switch between net worth only and assets vs debt view.
acceptanceCriteria: Add toggle: Net Worth | Assets vs Debt
Default is Net Worth (existing line chart)

userStories.title: Add holding detail chart for tradeable assets
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see price history for individual holdings.
acceptanceCriteria: Add price chart to holding detail page
Shows quantity changes over time as secondary line

userStories.title: Add super detail chart for snapshot assets
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see balance history for super holdings.
acceptanceCriteria: Add balance chart to super holding detail page
Shows contribution breakdown as stacked bars

userStories.title: Add loading and error states to all chart components
userStories.description: As a user, I want clear feedback when charts are loading or fail.
acceptanceCriteria: All chart components have skeleton loading state
Error state shows friendly message with retry button
Loading state matches existing dashboard skeleton patterns

userStories.title: Add chart export functionality
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to export charts as images.
acceptanceCriteria: Add download button to each major chart
Filename includes chart type and date
Uses html2canvas or recharts built-in export
